name: Fries to the top!
description:
You are a seagull, wanting to climb the heavens above the city. However, you have really bad cardio and can only flap your wings a limited number of times before you need to eat french fries to restore your energy. You can also catch a ride on the upwinds around the city.

Pre-made assets used:
- Wind sound from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/wind-sound-171345
- Upwind sound from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cge1QAxgWXg
- Flap sound from https://freesound.org/people/_stubb/sounds/389634/
